ratings.comment: Professor Schweidel now works at Emory University and I had him for MKT 499R (AI in Marketing). I really enjoyed class since the material was current and applicable. Participation MATTERS, so come to class (even though it's not mandatory) and be memorable. Find a GREAT group early on since you'll be working with them on projects ALL semester.
If you pay attention in this class you will do fine. You have to take notes and you have to go but other than that he makes it almost impossible to do poorly. One of my favorite prof's so far.

Schweidel is a nice guy and clearly enjoys market research. However lectures are very dry and boring, as the semester goes on, you can tell the classroom is getting more and more empty. If you pay attention and utilize his advice during office hours, the class is pretty easy and the group project should go smoothly.
Pretty good prof. However, kind of a hard grader. Not an easy A.
It was extremely difficult to learn anything in this class-way too much information crammed into course and not taught very well.  Overall, nice guy and wants you to do well
